name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Test Automation Engineer with 13+ years of full stack development experience, specializing in **Python** and performance testing. Proficient in **Jenkins**, **GitLab CI**, and containerization tools like **Docker** and **Podman**. Strong capabilities in cloud platforms including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, with hands-on expertise in deploying solutions within **Kubernetes** environments.
Experienced in utilizing performance testing tools and implementing security testing practices to ensure high-performance, secure applications. Adept at collaborating across teams and communicating complex technical concepts clearly.
Background includes building AI/ML-powered platforms with **FastAPI**, **Django**, and utilizing **Elastic Stack** and **Splunk** for unified logging and monitoring. Proven track record in compliance-driven development, adhering to standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.

Facilitated collaborative problem-solving sessions with cross-functional teams to enhance communication and improve testing strategies, resulting in clearer objectives and reduced issue resolution time by **30%**.
Integrated logging solutions using **Elastic Stack** and **Splunk** for unified logging, enabling real-time monitoring and analysis of application performance and security events.
